attributes.action: ABOLISH speed the 55 limit ON TRUCKS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the speed set by the eu of 55mph for trucks but the speed limit on the motorway is 60 and abolish the 40 mph on single carriageway road limiting trucks to 55 on motorway just causes trafic jams you need to get rid of the 55 limit after all its a eu thing and all the trucks that come from th eu are not limited to 55
